name: Boku no Choro-Q
overview: The Choro Q video games are a series of console games based on Takara's Choro Q toy cars (also known as Penny Racers in English-speaking markets). The games have been localised for Western release under many different names, including Gadget Racers, Penny Racers and Road Trip. Instead of the usual racing games that are featured in the Choro Q series, this time the player control a boy in a collection of mini games: Driving a truck to avoid that some workers get hurt, be a firefighter and help putting out a fire in a building, drive a train, solve a question mini game, etc. In the game the player will drive different vehicles to solve the different mini games. There are infinite trial in each mini game, and when the player pass one he can choose one of the other mini games. This a game specially designed for young audiences but everyone can play it.
